atk-s0302a1:2_1: Abhisamayasaṁyuttassa paṭhame nakhasikhāyanti maṁsaṭṭhānena vimutte nakhagge.
atk-s0302a1:2_2: Nakhasikhā ca nāma lokiyānaṁ mahatīpi hoti,
atk-s0302a1:2_6: Bhagavatā hi atthaṁ ñāpetukāmena adhiṭṭhānabalena tattha patiṭṭhāpito.
atk-s0302a1:2_7: Satimaṁ kalanti mahāpathaviyā paṁsuṁ satakoṭṭhāse katvā tato ekakoṭṭhāsaṁ.
atk-s0302a1:2_10: Purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāyāti etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ,
atk-s0302a1:2_11: yadidaṁ parikkhīṇanti evaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ upanidhāya,
atk-s0302a1:2_12: ñāṇena taṁ tassa santike ṭhapetvā upaparikkhiyamāneti attho.
atk-s0302a1:2_18: Yaṁ sattasu attabhāvesu apāye aṭṭhamañca paṭisandhiṁ ādiṁ katvā yattha katthaci uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a1:4_4: Kākapeyyāti sakkā hoti tīre ṭhitena kākena pakatiyāpi mukhatuṇḍikaṁ otāretvā pātuṁ. Dutiyaṁ.
atk-s0302a1:6_4: Dve vā ti vāti dve vā tīṇi vā.
atk-s0302a1:6_6: Saṁbhejjaudakanti aññāhi nadīhi saddhiṁ sambhinnaṭṭhāne udakaṁ.
atk-s0302a1:8_6: Pariyosāne pana aññatitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakānaṁ adhigamoti bāhirakānaṁ sabbopi guṇādhigamo paṭhamamaggena
atk-s0302a1:8_7: adhigataguṇānaṁ satabhāgampi sahassabhāgampi satasahassabhāgampi na upagacchatīti.
